attributes.action: bullying to be treated as a criminal act!
attributes.additional_details:
Too many people are being bullied and it is resulting in poor innocent people of all ages, gender and nationality to commit suicide!

These bullies need to be taught that it is not right and it shouldn't be tolerated!

Please start classing any form of bullying a criminal act! It is causing people to take there own lifes because they feel they have no other way out!

Its gone on for too long....it needs to stop!
